verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H5921"\w*? \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* are \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* helping \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* words \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* groaning?

\w My|strong="H5800"\w* God, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* cry \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* daytime, \w but|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* don’t \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*; \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* night season, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* am not silent.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3915"\w* holy, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* inhabit \w the|strong="H7121"\w* praises \w of|strong="H7121"\w* Israel.

\w Our|strong="H3478"\w* fathers trusted \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3478"\w*. \w They|strong="H3478"\w* trusted, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3478"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.
They cried to you, and were \w delivered|strong="H6403"\w*. They trusted in you, and were not disappointed.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worm, \w and|strong="H2199"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* man; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reproach \w of|strong="H3808"\w* men, \w and|strong="H2199"\w* despised \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

All those \w who|strong="H5971"\w* see \w me|strong="H2781"\w* mock \w me|strong="H2781"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w insult|strong="H2781"\w* \w me|strong="H2781"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* lips. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* shake \w their|strong="H3808"\w* heads, saying,

“\w He|strong="H3605"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H7200"\w*. Let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* rescue \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, since \w he|strong="H3605"\w* delights \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H5337"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* womb. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* trust \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mother’s breasts.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* was thrown \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s womb. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7699"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother bore \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Don’t be \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* trouble is \w near|strong="H5921"\w*. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* there is no one \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help.
Many bulls \w have|strong="H3588"\w* surrounded \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. Strong bulls \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Bashan \w have|strong="H3588"\w* encircled \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.
They open \w their|strong="H5437"\w* mouths wide against \w me|strong="H5437"\w*, lions tearing prey \w and|strong="H6499"\w* roaring.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water. \w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* joint. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* wax. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* melted \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H6106"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* dried \w up|strong="H8210"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* potsherd. \w My|strong="H3605"\w* tongue sticks \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* roof \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dust \w of|strong="H4325"\w* death.

\w For|strong="H6083"\w* dogs \w have|strong="H4194"\w* surrounded \w me|strong="H8239"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* company \w of|strong="H4194"\w* evildoers \w have|strong="H4194"\w* enclosed \w me|strong="H8239"\w*. \w They|strong="H3581"\w* \w have|strong="H4194"\w* pierced \w my|strong="H3581"\w* hands \w and|strong="H6083"\w* feet.\f + \fr 22:16 \ft So Dead Sea Scrolls. Masoretic Text reads, “Like a lion, they pin my hands and feet.”\f*

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* can count \w all|strong="H5437"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* look \w and|strong="H3027"\w* stare \w at|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* divide \w my|strong="H3605"\w* garments \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* cast lots \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* clothing.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* don’t \w be|strong="H3830"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help. Hurry \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help \w me|strong="H5921"\w*!

Deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* precious life \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* power \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dog.

\w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* lion’s \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*! Yes, \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w rescued|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* horns \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* wild oxen.

I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w declare|strong="H6030"\w* \w your|strong="H3467"\w* name \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* brothers. Among \w the|strong="H6030"\w* assembly, I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w You|strong="H8432"\w* who fear \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H8432"\w*! All \w you|strong="H8432"\w* descendants \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*, glorify \w him|strong="H8432"\w*! Stand \w in|strong="H8432"\w* awe \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H8432"\w*, all \w you|strong="H8432"\w* descendants \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Israel!

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3373"\w* despised \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* abhorred \w the|strong="H3605"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* afflicted, \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hidden \w his|strong="H3605"\w* face \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*; \w but|strong="H3513"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* heard.

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w comes|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w* assembly. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* vows \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H6041"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3373"\w* humble \w shall|strong="H5088"\w* eat \w and|strong="H8416"\w* \w be|strong="H5088"\w* satisfied. They \w shall|strong="H5088"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* seek after \w him|strong="H5048"\w*. Let \w your|strong="H7999"\w* hearts live forever.

\w All|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* remember \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w All|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* relatives \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* worship \w before|strong="H2421"\w* \w you|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ruler \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rich ones \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w and|strong="H3068"\w* worship. \w All|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dust \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* bow before \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* can’t keep \w his|strong="H3068"\w* soul alive.

Posterity \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w serve|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. Future generations \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* told \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w They|strong="H5608"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* come \w and|strong="H5647"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* righteousness \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* people \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H5647"\w* born, \w for|strong="H5608"\w* \w he|strong="H2233"\w* \w has|strong="H2233"\w* \w done|strong="H5647"\w* it.
